channel.title: Northstream Germany
channel.description: Welcome to Northstream Germany Software Solutions. We develop cutting edge software for our global business and government customers.

item.title: Security sensitive application for smartphones and mobile devices
item.description: Northstream Germany develops a pioneering, innovative security sensitive application for smartphones and mobile devices.

item.title: Again new company record sales
item.description: Northstream Germany has closed the third quarter of 2012 once again with a new company record sales.

item.title: Northstream Germany increased spending on research and development
item.description: In the budget plan for the year 2013, Northstream Germany is increasing spending on research and development, again by more than 30%. The company is reacting to the rapid development in mobile communications, cloud computing and IT security.

item.title: Volkswagen awards research contract
item.description: The Volkswagen Group (Wolfsburg) has commissioned a feasibility study for a new geo-tracking procedure.
